projects.title: AVRYai AI Receptionist Platform
projects.description: B2B SaaS voice AI receptionist platform that handles inbound business calls, messaging workflows, and calendar scheduling.
highlights: Designed a multi-service architecture with a voice gateway and API backend
Integrated telephony, calendar, SMS, and billing providers into one workflow
Shipped containerized services for cloud deployment
challenges: Coordinating real-time call events across multiple external APIs
Maintaining reliability across async voice, scheduling, and messaging flows
architecture_snapshot: `api/` FastAPI service contains routers, services, models, and migrations
evidence: `api/main.py` is the backend entrypoint and `api/services/` holds integration logic
README local run command: `node server.js` from `voice-gateway/`

projects.title: Betty Sports Betting Research Platform
projects.description: Real-time data aggregation and scoring engine for evaluating betting opportunities across sportsbooks and prediction markets.
highlights: Built multi-source ingestion from websocket and REST market feeds
Implemented a weighted scoring engine with configurable factors
Structured historical tracking with database models and migrations
challenges: Normalizing heterogeneous odds and market data in real time
Balancing ingestion latency with scoring consistency
architecture_snapshot: `src/connectors/` separates websocket and REST source integrations
`src/models/` and `src/database.py` back persistence for tracked events
evidence: `docker-compose.yml` and `Dockerfile` are in the project root
Dependencies include FastAPI, Redis, SQLAlchemy, and websockets in `requirements.txt`

projects.title: Chatty Multi-Interface LLM Client
projects.description: Monorepo chat platform with web, API, and CLI interfaces for model interaction and conversation export.
highlights: Built separate web UI, REST/SSE API, and terminal CLI in one workspace
Implemented conversation history and export endpoints
Used Prisma migrations with containerized local Postgres
challenges: Keeping behavior consistent across web and CLI interaction layers
Managing monorepo tooling and local developer experience
architecture_snapshot: API service in `apps/api/src/index.ts` uses Prisma and Postgres
Web UI is a Next.js app in `apps/web/`
`docker-compose.yml` provisions local Postgres on host port 5433
evidence: `apps/api`, `apps/web`, and `apps/cli` each include their own package manifests
`apps/api/prisma/` and Prisma scripts are present in `apps/api/package.json`
API README command: `pnpm --filter @chatty/api prisma migrate dev`

projects.title: AVRYai Sales Copilot
projects.description: Real-time assistant that transcribes sales conversations and generates next-response suggestions during live calls.
highlights: Built streaming pipeline from captured audio to transcript to suggestion
Implemented low-latency suggestion loop with rolling context
Delivered overlay UX for in-call guidance
challenges: Handling live audio capture and streaming constraints
Controlling response quality under strict real-time latency
evidence: Backend entrypoint is `backend/main.py` with FastAPI dependencies in `backend/requirements.txt`
Frontend React app files include `frontend/src/App.jsx` and `frontend/src/Copilot.jsx`
Desktop shell includes Tauri config under `avryai-copilot-tauri/src-tauri/tauri.conf.json`
README command: `npm run dev` from frontend

projects.title: Beary Trading Dashboard
projects.description: Kraken-style trading command center with live bot monitoring, charts, order book, and analytics views.
highlights: Developed full-stack dashboard with real-time data channels
Implemented backend fallbacks for resilience during data-source outages
Organized services for local and containerized execution
challenges: Presenting fast-moving market data without UI instability
Blending mock and live modes for reliable development
evidence: Dashboard code is split into `dashboard/backend/` and `dashboard/frontend/`
Project-level dependencies include data and trading libraries in `requirements.txt`

projects.title: AVRYai Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Operational dashboard for authentication, lead tracking, and SMS conversation management.
highlights: Created authenticated dashboard flows with client-side routing
Implemented periodic refresh patterns for active operational data
Shipped responsive UI for desktop and mobile use
challenges: Maintaining usability while handling high-volume conversation data
Coordinating optimistic UI behavior with API refresh cycles
